genbank:Reference.genbank:authors: Richie CT, Whitaker LR, Whitaker KW, Necarsulmer J, Baldwin HA, Zhang Y, Fortuno L, Hinkle JJ, Koivula P, Henderson MJ, Sun W, Wang K, Smith JC, Pickel J, Ji N, Hope BT, Harvey BK
genbank:Reference.genbank:title: Near-infrared fluorescent protein iRFP713 as a reporter protein for optogenetic vectors, a transgenic Cre-reporter rat, and other neuronal studies.

sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:aPortionOfThisPlasmidWasDerivedF:
the ORF for iRFP was obtained from Addgene (Plasmid 31857).
the backbone was obtained from Karl Deisseroth, but is also available from Addgene (Plasmid 26969).

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: blue light-activated cation channel
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:product: H134R mutant of an N-terminal fragment of channelrhodopsin-2 from the alga Chlamydomonas reinhardtii (Nagel et al., 2005)
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: ChR2(H134R)
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: ChR2(H134R)
iRFP713
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: iRFP713
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: name was changed to iRFP713 (Shcherbakova and Verkhusha, 2013)
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:product: phytochrome-based near-infrared fluorescent protein, originally termed iRFP (Filonov et al., 2011)

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: inverted terminal repeat of adeno-associated virus serotype 2
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: AAV2 ITR
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: AAV2 ITR

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:product: Factor Xa recognition and cleavage site
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: Factor Xa site

sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:refBib: Near-infrared fluorescent protein iRFP713 as a reporter protein for optogenetic vectors, a transgenic Cre-reporter rat, and other neuronal studies. Richie CT, Whitaker LR, Whitaker KW, Necarsulmer J, Baldwin HA, Zhang Y, Fortuno L, Hinkle JJ, Koivula P, Henderson MJ, Sun W, Wang K, Smith JC, Pickel J, Ji N, Hope BT, Harvey BK. J Neurosci Methods. 2017 Jun 1;284:1-14. doi: 10.1016/j.jneumeth.2017.03.020. Epub 2017 Apr 2. 10.1016/j.jneumeth.2017.03.020 PubMed 28380331
sbol:ComponentDefinition.dcterms:description: An AAV vector that expresses channel rhodopsin 2 (H134R) (fused to iRFP) under the CaM Kinase IIa promoter..
